title: 5 autumn catwalk trends to buy second hand - and where to find them
text:
As seasons change the allure of filling our wardrobes with neutral colour palettes, silk shirts and cosy jumpers can be palpable. From prairie dresses on the catwalk at Brock Collection to blast-from-the-past bags at Chloé, there are many autumn/winter '19 trends that I personally can’t wait to dip into - but the thought of adding something brand new to my wardrobe seems like the antithesis of being a responsible shopper.

With Oxfam's Second Hand September, a plethora of new fashion rental sites and the Buy Less, Buy Better movement for inspiration, I'm looking to update my wardrobe in a more sustainable way. Lucky, then, that thanks to the cyclical nature of fashion, many of autumn's biggest trends...
description: As seasons change the allure of filling our wardrobes with neutral colour palettes, silk shirts and cosy jumpers can be palpable.
